reuters.title: ZAYRE CORP 4TH QTR SHR 73 CTS VS 60 CTS
reuters.body: Sears, Roebuck and Co said revenues of its Merchandise Group in February rose 4.9 pct to 1.85 billion dlrs from 1.76 billion dlrs a year ago. It said domestic sales were led by better than average increases in apparel, home fashions and hardware. Reuter 
